name: Pizza
description: 1 1/2 cups (355 ml) warm water (105°F-115°F) 1 package (2 1/4 teaspoons) active dry yeast 3 3/4 cups (490g) bread flour 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil.

name: Donuts
description: For the donuts 1 1/4 cups whole milk, lukewarm (110°F to 115°F) 1/4 cup granulated sugar 1 packet (2 1/4 teaspoons) active dry yeast.

name: Falafel
description: For the tahini sauce: 1/2 cup tahini (I like Joyva) 1/4 cup Greek yogurt 1/2 lemon, juice only 2 tablespoons olive oil 1/4 to 1/2 cup hot water.

name: Meatloaf
description: 1/4 cup plus 2 tbsp ketchup, I use organic, 2 tsp Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 small onion, 1 tsp olive oil, 1.3 lb 99% lean ground turkey.

name: Salad
description: ½ cup chopped walnuts, 1 bunch spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces, ½ cup dried cranberries, ½ cupcrumbled blue cheese.

name: Salmon
description: 1 ½ teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon paprika,1 teaspoon ground cardamom, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, ½ teaspoon ground black pepper, ¼ cup grapeseed oil, 2 tablespoons maple syrup, 1 (2 pound) salmon fillet, cut into 3-inch pieces.

name: Pancakes
description: 1 cup sifted self-rising flour, 1 cup milk, 1 egg, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil.

name: Burgers
description: 2 (1 pound) packages Farmland® Fresh Ground Pork, 2 tablespoons minced yellow onion, 2 teaspoons hot sauce, 1 pinch Kosher salt.
